page.title: 02Religion.
page.content: to talk about Christian Faith and issues affecting them as they get ready to leave school. There are Guides and Brownies, Scouts and Cubs. There is Mustard Seed, a singing Group, and for adults 'Man to Man'. There are House groups and three different groups for women. On Saturday, the church invites people to drop in for coffee, and chat about faith and any problems they have. The Whit Walks originally started to get people to come out of the church, into the street, and share their faith with otjers. It is a very long tradition in Lancashire. From this basis a sort of Carnival attitude developed, with a big fair in the afternoon. Everyone used to buy new clothes, and even now, coins are often given to those taking part in the Walks.Originally to pay for clothes now for Church or charity)
